description:
The victim reported that a bicycle was stolen from their opened
garage door during the overnight hours.

The victim reported that their vehicle was spray
painted and the trim was ripped off while
it was parked at this location.

The complainant reported that multiple windows were stolen from this home
under construction.
A license plate was reported stolen from a vehicle.

Unknown subject(s) wrote graffiti on a sign in the
area.
